name: Vayne
title: The Night Hunter
description: A skilled marksman who hunts the supernatural creatures that plague the night.

p.name: Night Hunter
p.description: Vayne gains 30 movement speed when moving toward an enemy champion.

q.name: Tumble
q.description: Vayne tumbles to a nearby location and gains increased attack damage.

w.name: Silver Bolts
w.description: Vayne's attacks apply Silver Bolts. After 3 attacks, the bolts detonate, dealing true damage.

e.name: Condemn
e.description: Vayne fires a projectile that pushes an enemy back. If they hit a wall, they are stunned.

r.name: Final Hour
r.description: Vayne becomes invisible and gains increased movement speed and attack range.

standard.name: Standard Build
standard.description: High damage ADC build focused on attack speed and critical strike

defensive.name: Defensive Build
defensive.description: Balanced build with defensive items for survivability

combos.name: Condemn into Tumble
combos.description: Use Condemn to stun enemy against wall, then Tumble away

combos.name: Silver Bolts Proc
combos.description: Attack 3 times to proc Silver Bolts true damage, then Tumble away

combos.name: Final Hour Burst
combos.description: Activate Final Hour, Tumble in, attack 3 times for Silver Bolts, then Condemn

favorable.reason: Vayne's mobility allows her to dodge Ashe's arrows
Vayne can Condemn Caitlyn away from her traps
Vayne's Tumble can dodge Jinx's rockets

unfavorable.reason: Draven's early damage is too high for Vayne
Lucian's mobility and damage outpace Vayne early
Miss Fortune's AOE damage is hard to avoid
